nodes.text: The Freefall-class bomber was designed to serve as a bomber. Jinkins' personal starfighter, the Freefall, was a modified version of this craft.

Measuring 30 meters in length, the Freefall-class was named for the fact that it was designed to simply drop unguided bombs on a target. The craft's central fuselage could accommodate up to 20 metric tons of cargo, and was attached to two huge, wing-mounted sublight engines. A pair of cockpit-mounted laser cannons provided defensive armament, in addition to its bomb chute.
